title: Adiye Unna Paathida Lyrics Vetrivel
stanzas:
pozhudhum un vaasana
aasaiya koottudhe
adangaa matha yaanaiya
pol thaakkuthe

usure.. un oara paarva
sakkaratha nenjukulla
suththa viduthe

Adiye unna
paathida paathida
naan kolanjaene
azhagaa indha
aaradi aambalaiyaa
velanjaene

Yedhukku ena nee
poraiyaera oottura
soruthu kaiyira
vizhiyaala maatura

munnazhagil neethaan
murkkera jaada kaattura
otha nodi kooda
othungaama theeya mootura

engo edhum neeyaaga
un nenappu theeyaaga
pudichen pudichen
nenjil aani adichen.

unna naan Nenachaa
thirumaagi poguren
velakku thirinaan
vidivellai aaguren

eththanaiyo vaartha
therinjaalum vaaya mooduren
oththa pana oala
adhu pola naanum aaduren

siththathula noiyaaga
moththathula thaaiyaaga
kedacha kedacha
enna yaendi kalachcha

pozhudhum un vaasana
aasaiya koottudhe
adangaa matha yaanaiya
pol thaakkuthe

usure.. un oara paarva
sakkaratha nenjukulla
suththa viduthe
